descriptionHtml:
A mod to summon a tiger in Skyrim. Actually I had the idea of making the tiger smaller in size but guess the results in game doesn\'t look good lol so I reverted it back to its default size. The tiger textures is the work of  muppetpuppet. I have included his textures in this file and NMM friendly. However, all other sabre cats will also look like a tiger, its a common texture in use by the game anyway.
So credits to  muppetpuppet for his tiger textures. Visit his mod link via - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10473

If you plan to install muppetpuppet tiger retexture manually, you need to rename the dds from sabretiger.dds to sabrecat.dds and the tiger skin texture will work for you in game.
author: simplesim
